Text: and how now i can open this FLAC file :mad:

NoOneImportant, you could follow the link for FLAC information.

If you are using Linux, then support is probably already included in your distro.  XBMC already supports FLAC, VLC supports FLAC.

For windows, download http://cyberial.com/flacinstaller.asp
NoOneImportant, just download Winamp. It plays the most kind of formats..
foobar2k supports it too, + its free and not winamp :p
